    28 December 2013

    Hello Manju

    Igor Ramadas

    Born in Belo Horizonte (Brazil), adventured in London (UK), living in Berlin (Germany), working at Zalando, addicted to music and making the most out of his 24 daily hours.

    Software

    Node.js, CoffeeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, MongoDB, NoSQL, .NET, C#. This list won't stop growing.
    @ GitHub@ CodePlex@ Coderwall

    Music

    My last 90 days top artists are Tina Dico, The Swell Season, Alle Farben, Damien Rice, Boy, Go Jimmy Go, Sublime, Mira & Chris Schwarzwalder, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Sublime with Rome.
    @ Last.fm@ SoundCloud

    Sports

    In the last 90 days I did 755km by foot, and cycled for around 13h 17m. And I go bouldering every monday.
